page.syntax: Width as N = UI_POPUP_MENU_WIDTH(C menubar[,N height_limit])

argument.name: Width
argument.description: The width of the menu in inches.

argument.name: height_limit
argument.description: Optional. Height limit for the menu. Numeric

page.description: Get the width of a popup menu (with optional height restriction).
page.discussion: The UI_POPUP_MENU_WIDTH() function returns the width of a menu.
